abilities.description: Creates a spherical operating room space where Law can manipulate anything within
Swaps the positions or hearts of objects and people within ROOM, enabling personality transplant surgery
Can cut people and objects apart within ROOM without causing harm or death

keyMoments.description: Law uses Shambles to body-swap Sanji, Nami, Franky, and Chopper
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Law's ability to perform personality transplant surgery

keyMoments.description: Law cuts Tashigi in half using his surgical powers
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law can dismember people without killing them

keyMoments.description: Law destroys the Marine battleship by cutting it in half
keyMoments.significance: Shows the destructive potential of the Ope Ope no Mi against large objects

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Limited by the size of the ROOM that can be created
Requires concentration and stamina to maintain ROOM

reveals.information: The Ope Ope no Mi can swap people's minds/hearts into different bodies via Shambles
Law can cut people in half without killing them due to his surgical precision
